body_html: I am also experiencing a similar bug on Windows. In my case, the GPU memory usage keeps increasing around 200MB per day for around 2 queries per second traffic. Just want to know how bad is your memory leak? Does it eat up your memory very fast, or increasing in slow process like I do?
